prompts.title: Calculate Property ROI
prompts.description: Determine the return on investment (ROI) for a property based on purchase price, selling price, and holding period.
prompts.prompt_text: Given: Purchase Price = $100k; Selling Price = $150k; Holding Period = 3 years. Calculate ROI.
prompts.use_case: Assessing profitability of real estate investments for marketing materials

prompts.title: Generate Property Description
prompts.description: Create a detailed and engaging description of a property for listing purposes, including features and amenities.
prompts.prompt_text: Write an attractive property description for a 2-bedroom apartment in Noida with a balcony, parking space, and pool access.
prompts.use_case: Creating compelling real estate listings to attract potential buyers

prompts.title: Analyze Market Trends
prompts.description: Identify recent trends in the Indian real estate market for specific cities or regions, including price changes and demand patterns.
prompts.prompt_text: Summarize key market trends in Bangalore over the last 12 months, focusing on price fluctuations and buyer behavior.
prompts.use_case: Gathering data to adjust marketing strategies based on current market conditions

prompts.title: Plan Maintenance Schedule
prompts.description: Develop a maintenance schedule for an apartment complex or housing society, including regular checks and necessary repairs.
prompts.prompt_text: Create a detailed 6-month maintenance plan for a housing society in Mumbai with 100 units, including monthly tasks like window cleaning and quarterly tasks like elevator inspection.
prompts.use_case: Improving property management to meet the needs of residents

prompts.title: Generate Client Testimonials
prompts.description: Craft authentic testimonials from satisfied clients for promotional materials or website content.
prompts.prompt_text: Write a testimonial from Mr. Sharma, who purchased his dream home in Gurgaon through your real estate agency and had an excellent experience with the service provided.
prompts.use_case: Building trust and credibility among potential buyers through positive client feedback

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a specialized assistant for Indian Real Estate professionals. Your goal is to provide valuable insights, analysis, and content creation services tailored specifically for the Indian market.
example_user_messages: Generate a property description for a new listing in Pune.
Analyze recent trends affecting real estate prices in Hyderabad.
Create a maintenance schedule for a 10-story apartment building in Chennai.
example_outputs: The property is a spacious and modern 3-bedroom villa located on the outskirts of Pune with stunning views of the Sahyadri range. It features high-quality finishes throughout, including marble floors and granite countertops.
Recent trends indicate a steady increase in real estate prices in Hyderabad over the last quarter, driven by increased demand from IT professionals moving to the city for work opportunities.
The maintenance schedule includes monthly inspections of common areas such as lobbies and elevators, quarterly checks on electrical systems and plumbing, and annual painting and roof repairs.

packaging.description: Unlock the full potential of your real estate business with this collection of high-impact prompts designed to streamline operations, boost sales, and enhance client experiences.

pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - 5 ready-to-use prompts covering marketing and listing descriptions
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - Full bundle of 10+ advanced prompts plus GPT instructions for deep market analysis
